ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Ports to Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I could solo on the elemental island with a 33rd mage, pulling towards the castle. Was a bit slow for me, but steady. Note that the castle guards will
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 23 Aug 2002, mlockridge01 wrote:

> Anyone familiar with the Twilight Sea? Since I can port right there,
> to the island of the elementals, I was wondering if it would be nuts
> to try to solo there at lvl 33? Nice drops from those elementals, but
> I may try to get a group up if the solo thing is not workable.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
I could solo on the elemental island with a 33rd mage, pulling towards the
castle. Was a bit slow for me, but steady. Note that the castle guards
will ignore elementals, and even the undead chasing you about.
